message: Let's split the money 70/30. I believe this is a fair offer considering the time pressure and your devaluation.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 60/40 split to reflect the time pressure we both face.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to secure a larger share. Let's settle on 65/35 to avoid further devaluation for both of us.
Alice, we're getting close to a deal.  I'm willing to be flexible, but 55/45 is the best I can do. Time is running out!
